messages.content: Hi, thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Adam. May I know your name, please?
Hi Adam, my name is Hannah.
Nice to meet you, Hannah. How can I assist you today?
I'm really disappointed with your delivery service. I ordered Purina Pro Plan for my dog, and it hasn't arrived yet.
I'm sorry to hear that, Hannah. Let me check the status of your delivery for you. Could you please provide your order number?
Thank you, Hannah. Let me look into that for you. Please hold on for a moment.
Hannah, it appears that there has been a delay with the shipping of your Purina Pro Plan. The new estimated delivery date is in three days.
Three more days? That's unacceptable. My dog needs his food now. What are you going to do about it?

I understand your frustration, Hannah, and I apologize for the inconvenience. I will escalate this issue to our shipping department to see if we can expedite your delivery. In the meantime, I can offer you a discount on your next purchase.
A discount on my next purchase doesn't help me now. I need the food as soon as possible.
I completely understand, Hannah. I will make sure to escalate this matter with high priority. Is there anything else I can assist you with while we work on expediting your delivery?
Just make sure it gets here fast. That's all.
I will do everything I can to ensure it gets to you as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience, Hannah.
